name: Untitled Mar Game 4
description: The long-awaited fourth game in this franchise of games that I refuse to name. This one is all about our pal, Everett.   When mar causes his usual havoc and hijinks, it is up to Everett to save the day once again. But will he be able to tackle his problems or will he fail and ruin the upcoming prom. You'll just have to play it and see.  You'll laugh, You'll cry, you'll even shit your pants, Introducing: Untitled Everett Game. And for the first time in Untitled Mar Game history, this game includes sound.
